languages.text: "Соломон, я бы не хотел{mf||а}, чтобы ты погиб, так что будь осторожен. Не стоит лишний раз рисковать".

traits.locale_text: "Соломон, я бы не хотел{mf||а}, чтобы ты погиб, так что будь осторожен. Не стоит лишний раз рисковать".

languages.text: "I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."
languages.original_text: "Соломон, я бы не хотел{mf||а}, чтобы ты погиб, так что будь осторожен. Не надо рисковать из-за меня".

traits.locale_text: "I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my behalf."
"I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my behalf."
"I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."
"I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."
"I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."
"I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."

languages.text: 「君に死んでほしくないんだ、ソロモーン。だから気をつけて。{mf|俺|私}のために命を危険にさらさないでくれ」
languages.original_text: "I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."

traits.locale_text: 「君に死んでほしくないんだ、ソロモーン。だから気をつけて。{mf|俺|私}のために命を危険にさらさないでくれ」

languages.text: "Ich will nicht, dass Ihr sterbt, Solomorne. Seid also vorsichtig. Riskiert nicht meinetwegen Euer Leben."
languages.original_text: "I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will nicht, dass Ihr sterbt, Solomorne. Seid also vorsichtig. Riskiert nicht meinetwegen Euer Leben."

languages.text: « Soyez prudent, Solomorne. Je ne veux pas vous voir mourir. Ne risquez pas votre vie pour moi. »
languages.original_text: "I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."

traits.locale_text: « Soyez prudent, Solomorne. Je ne veux pas vous voir mourir. Ne risquez pas votre vie pour moi. »

languages.text: «No quiero que muera, Solomorne, así que tenga cuidado. No arriesgue su vida por mí».
languages.original_text: "I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."

traits.locale_text: «No quiero que muera, Solomorne, así que tenga cuidado. No arriesgue su vida por mí».

languages.text: “我不想让你死，索罗蒙，所以你得小心点，别为了我冒生命危险。”
languages.original_text: "I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."

traits.locale_text: “我不想让你死，索罗蒙，所以你得小心点，别为了我冒生命危险。”

languages.text: "Ölmeni istemiyorum Solomorne. Dikkatli ol. Benim yüzümden canını tehlikeye atma."
languages.original_text: "I don't want you to die, Solomorne, so be careful. Don't risk your life on my account."

traits.locale_text: "Ölmeni istemiyorum Solomorne. Dikkatli ol. Benim yüzümden canını tehlikeye atma."
